editProfileDialogDescription: Make changes to your profile here. click save when you're done.
profileUpdateSuccessDesc: Your profile changes have been saved (locally for now).
profileUpdateSuccessDescApi: Your profile changes have been successfully saved.
invalidCurrencyCodeFormat: Invalid currency code. it must be 3 uppercase letters (e.g., USD, EUR).
setYourCurrencyDesc: Please set your preferred currency in your profile to ensure accurate financial tracking.
completeYourProfileDesc: Please set your preferred currency using the 'Edit profile' button below to ensure accurate financial tracking.
loginMinLengthError: Username must be at least 3 characters.
manageSubscriptionDesc: View your current plan, upgrade, or manage your billing details.
proPlanDesc: Unlock all features and get unlimited access.
freePlanDesc: Basic features, perfect for getting started.
appTokensDesc: Generate API tokens for use with external applications.
tokenGeneratedDesc: Your new application token is ready.
tokenDialogDesc: This is your new token. Copy it now, as you will not be able to see it again.
tokenCopiedDesc: The token has been copied to your clipboard.
copyFailedDesc: Could not copy token to clipboard.
copyNotSupportedDesc: Clipboard access is not available in this context.
apiSecurityDesc: Set your secret phrase to generate application tokens for external services.
userSecretMinLengthError: Secret must be at least 8 characters.
secretSavedSuccessDesc: Your API secret has been updated. You can now generate a token.
secretIsSetMsg: An API secret is set. You can overwrite it or generate a new token.
secretNotSetMsg: No API secret is set. Please set one to generate tokens.
